meanings.definition: A woman in charge of a convent or monastery.
meanings.sent1: The hegumene oversees the daily activities of the convent.
meanings.sent2: The hegumene is responsible for making important decisions for the monastery.
meanings.sent3: The hegumene organized a surprise party for the nuns.
meanings.sent4: Under the guidance of the hegumene, the convent flourished like a blooming garden.
meanings.sent5: The kind hegumene always listens to the concerns of the sisters.

meanings.definition: The leader of a group or organization.
meanings.sent1: As the hegumene of the club, she led the members in various activities.
meanings.sent2: The hegumene of the team motivated everyone to work together towards success.
meanings.sent3: The hegumene organized a fun team-building retreat.
meanings.sent4: The hegumene guided the group through challenges like a beacon of light.
meanings.sent5: Everyone respected the wise hegumene for her leadership skills.

meanings.sent1: She will hegumene the kingdom with fairness and compassion.
meanings.sent2: The council chose her to hegumene the city during the crisis.
meanings.sent3: He tried to hegumene over his siblings during playtime.
meanings.sent4: Love should hegumene over all decisions in life.
meanings.sent5: Her determination to hegumene brought positive changes to the community.
